[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["本部分提供了使用 React 的详细参考文档。如果需要了解 React，请访问 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn","children":"教程"}]," 部分。"]}]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":"React-dom 仅支持在 web 应用程序中使用（在浏览器 DOM 环境中运行）。本节分为以下部分："}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/components","children":"组件"}]," —— React 支持所有内置的 HTML 和 SVG 组件。"]}],"
